result.markdown:
---
title: "Quiz 1"
---




Welcome to the first quiz to test your knowledge after week 1 of the R coding club!

**NOTE: To use the widgets in the compiled HTML file, you need to have a JavaScript-enabled browser.**

## Questions

-   What is **not** an advantage of using R: <select class='webex-select'><option value='blank'></option><option value=''>Reproducibility</option><option value=''>Coding</option><option value='answer'>Point-and-click software</option></select>
-   How do you call the window in R Studio where your code is carried out? <select class='webex-select'><option value='blank'></option><option value=''>Script</option><option value=''>Environment</option><option value=''>Viewer</option><option value='answer'>Console</option></select>
-   How do you open the help file for a function? <select class='webex-select'><option value='blank'></option><option value='answer'>?functionname()</option><option value=''>help functionname</option><option value=''>functionname()</option><option value=''>functionname help?</option></select>
-   How do you load the tidyverse package? <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' size='20' data-answer='["library( tidyverse )","library( \"tidyverse\" )","library( 'tidyverse' )"]'/>
-   What is **not** a way to inspect your data? <select class='webex-select'><option value='blank'></option><option value=''>glimpse(dataframe)</option><option value='answer'>see(dataframe)</option><option value=''>View(dataframe)</option><option value=''>summary(dataframe)</option></select>
